system_meta.target_text: Iliad, Book XVIII (Pope Trans.) - The Shield of Achilles
system_meta.input_correction: User prompt label 'Ode on a Grecian Urn' ignored; processing pasted text 'The Shield of Achilles'.

o1_line_index.schema: uid | stanza_ref | line_num | text | modality | entities

sample_entries.text: Thee, welcome, goddess! what occasion calls
Then first he form'd the immense and solid shield;
Two cities radiant on the shield appear,
In arms the glittering squadron rising round / Rush sudden
A field deep furrow'd next the god design'd,
In living silver seem'd the waves to roll,

o2_panel_model.rationale: The Shield is an object of circular topology. Linear reading is an artifact of the codex. The grid must restore the concentricity. The 'Frame' (Thetis/Vulcan) exists in the corners (the workshop space), while the Shield occupies the circular center.

o3_grid_allocation.description: 24x24 Coordinate Space mapping. (0,0) is Top-Left. Center is (11.5, 11.5). Calculation: distance d = sqrt((x-11.5)^2 + (y-11.5)^2).

cells.content_strategy: The narrative of Thetis and Vulcan surrounds the shield. Corner (0,0) initiates the Request. Corner (23,23) finalizes the Delivery.
High redundancy. The text 'living silver... waves to roll' repeats effectively to form a fluid boundary.
Interleaved segments: The Dance (Daedalus) alternates with The Lions attacking the Bull.
Split into quadrants: Q1=Ploughing, Q2=Reaping, Q3=Feast, Q4=Vineyard. Cyclic reading direction.
Binary split. Top Hemisphere = City of Peace (Weddings/Law). Bottom Hemisphere = City of War (Ambush/Tumult).
Dense packing. Every cell contains the full cosmology list (Earth, Sky, Sea, Sun, Moon, Stars) to ensure the axis is unmissable.

o4_retrieval_ruleset.intent: Defines how a read-head (raycaster) extracts meaning from the grid.

rules.description: If ray hits a cell containing a Beacon pattern (e.g., '[[FORGE]]'), the parser enters 'Panel_Lock' mode for 5 subsequent steps.
rules.logic: Prevents flickering between semantic layers when traversing boundaries.

rules.description: When multiple panels are sampled in a single wide-beam query, precedence is given to Inner Rings over Outer Rings.
rules.logic: Simulates the eye drawn to the center of the shield first, then scanning outward.

rules.description: In P02 (Cities) and P03 (Agri), the raycaster applies semantic filtering based on polar angle.
rules.formula: if angle(0-180) -> prioritize 'PEACE/GROWTH'; if angle(180-360) -> prioritize 'WAR/HARVEST'.

rules.description: If a cell is empty or corrupted (noise), return content from the nearest neighbor towards the Center (11.5, 11.5).

steps: 1. Normalize text: Strip archaic punctuation, standardize whitespace.
2. Tokenize: Break into atomic semantic units (lines or half-lines).
3. Map: Assign tokens to Grid Coordinates (x,y) based on 'o3_grid_allocation' logic.
4. Pad: Fill remaining space in designated cells with 'Echo' tokens (repeated keywords) to saturate the address space.
5. Serialize: Output a single stream by scanning the grid row-by-row (0..23).
6. Delimit: Insert non-printable separators <ROW_END> and <PANEL_SHIFT> to allow reconstruction of the 2D manifold from the 1D stream.
